name: ONEON
description:
Made for Amaze Me Game Jam 2021. 

The jam's theme was "Neon".

Jump into this action packed platformer full of neon colors, lasers and vegetables!

You are Oneon, a cyber onion who shoots laser beams from his eyes. Fight your way through the vegetable processing plant!

Only one level included in game (boss fight and more levels will be added in the future)!

Controls :

Arrow Keys - movement

Z - Jump

X - Shoot

 Controller support also available! (Xbox One Controller recommended!)
